title: Xayah and Rakan Gifting Thread
body:
http://imgur.com/SYuXgU5

Greetings!

With the release of Rakan and Xayah, we have a promotion between April 19th - April 26th where you can gift the new champions for 6300 IP to a fellow player. If you're looking to get that flashy icon (gifter receives icon) or want to try your luck of the draw, reply here with your Summoner name and whether you'd like to receive or gift.

Remember that gifting limitations are 10 a day and you will have to wait 24 hours before you are able to gift a newly added friend.

{{champion:497}} {{champion:498}}

replies.body:
If you have not received your icon yet, **this is completely normal**. Icon distribution has been going on over the past few days, and may go on up until two weeks from now. If you don't have your icon by May 11th, 2017, submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support and they'll be able to look into this for you. Until then, please just hang tight. They're being rolled out!

[This event has since concluded](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions), but it was awesome seeing everyone in the gifting spirit, and hopefully we'll see a similar event soon!
I can gift you rakan or xayah or both if you can gift my friend either elise of khazix. Add me if you want to.

I only have 1 ADC (Ashe) so i would love another to try out... I also play a lot of support so if i get another support instead i wouldn't cry.

only lvl 28 and still working on rune pages, dont have the IP to get them for myself or anyone else :(
I strongly recommend getting Sivir (another 450 IP marksman) and Tristana (free champ and skin if you like facebook page, iirc).

> [{quoted}](name=Exercise85,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MPd8wJoe,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-04-20T01:40:22.784+0000)
>
> I only have 1 ADC (Ashe) so i would love another to try out... I also play a lot of support so if i get another support instead i wouldn't cry.
> 
> only lvl 28 and still working on rune pages, dont have the IP to get them for myself or anyone else :(

Quick tip that I learned when starting in October. You can get Tristana, another adc and one of her skins for free. Same with garen, and Alistar. You subscribe to their fb, twitter, and YouTube. Look it up for other info!
I'm a casual player so I don't have much IP to buy champions, but I would love to receive Rakan!

Same here. I know most people want xayah but i'm more interested in rakan.

IGN is DJTron

Go supports!

Also, Rakan is much less annoying.
Hi, I'm a Xayah one-trick since season 1 with over 9000 mastery points and have never lost a game with her. Please gift me her so I can continue my dominance to challenjour. Ty.

Hi Keyru, thanks for the thread! I think this is such a great idea for giving people with lots of IP sitting around a chance to use it up. I also think this is a great bonding activity between both friends and complete strangers alike.

Unfortunately, I can't participate in a trade. I don't have enough IP to give anyone Xayah or Rakan. :'(
No worries! Double IP weekend in T-minus 1 day!
I just got my bf to start playing, he just hit 20, would be cool if anyone would gift him either of the champs! He nicks "Actual Cannibal" on EUW :)

> [{quoted}](name=Dj Slime Time,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MPd8wJoe,comment-id=01fa,timestamp=2017-04-22T11:31:08.325+0000)
>
> I just got my bf to start playing, he just hit 20, would be cool if anyone would gift him either of the champs! He nicks "Actual Cannibal" on EUW :)

love ya <3

roses are red
violets are blue
if you gift me rakan
ill be in love with you

I'd like to gift anybody who adds me any champ, I own all the champs so I have a lot of IP xD
Edit: Okay no more IP sorry :(

Honestly, i'm just happy you guys are offering us such a great icon. Events like these are exactly what we needed ... letting us gift people without having to use RP. Thank you for allowing us to do this through our time earning game IP rather than our wallets.

My name on the client is The Dark SouI ... and the I <--- is actually a capital i lmao.
Would really love having this icon, it's well designed and suits me perfectly.

Thanks again Riot for this amazing event. You've done well.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Q: If I gift these to someone, do they get both Xayah and Rakan? I really want Xayah (try her toplane >:P) and am thinking of trading gifts with my friend.
You either gift xayah or rakan. They don't gift at the same time. But you can gift both separately. Both for 6300 ip each. Hope that helps! :)
The boards being kind and gifting one another? There's faith in humanity after all

I have IP for 2 people (EUW)
edit: 1 left
Edit:0 left
Could you gift me Rakan possibly? I'd really love to learn a new support. Thx in advance <3
Hi! I'm sorry but I went on holidays so I gave en both to the other player that added me :(
My support pool consists of mid laners  >:D  1 rakan = 1 "real" support for le autofill.
Ok limit has been reached, ty.
Hey my name is Whiteknight414, original I know, and would love to be gifted Xayah if anyone would be kind enough and can spare the ip to do so. Thank you very much
I'll send you a friend request in a bit and send you Xayah.

Hey everyone! I am looking to exchange gifts with someone who is willing to wait the 24 hours! I already have Rakan and would like Xayah, add me at Priest Oblivion and tell me which you would like <3
Cheers!
-EDIT: Found someone to trade, but up for games to play together!
Anyone willing to gift trade? I'm 450 ip away from getting 6300 and I want to gift someone and at the same time receive a champion.
I can! I have 6500 IP. You gift me Xayah, I can gift you Rakan/Xayah?
Alright I will have the ip by tomorrow. And for the champion I want, I really don't care. Both seem like so much fun to play
If someone with a plethora of ip is willing to gift me Xaya or Rakan that'd be great.

Hi, umm, I'd really like either Xayah or Rakan, i'm not fussy. I play on NA with this account, and I can play the botlane with you if you'd like although I prefer to voice-chat if we were gonna play. I'm a bit shy though. ADC and Support are my favourite roles. I know a lot of people have all the champions and a lot of IP, so if you feel like doing a kind deed I'm right here {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
If possible I would like to receive either of the new champs. The Summoner name is Garak2. Thanks in advance if anyone actually does gift one to me.
I would love for someone to gift me Rakan, im a support main trying to get gold this season. Thx to anyone who will do it. (recieve){{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

If you haven't had someone gift you yet I can gift you. Add me in game and I should see it by tomorrow. Good luck!
Edit: I can't accept any more requests

Hey! 

I also need a kind person to gift me Xayah. I don't have any friend playing League so it's very hard for me to find generous beings that can gift me :'( . Just saying that in case he already got his gift or if he doesn't reply. 


Have a nice day! ^.^
Sure! Add me in game and if by the time I can gift you the OP hasn't replied then I'll gift you.

please gift me rakan ill add you

Sorry, I'm going to be out of IP once I gift either this person or the first person. There are some other people on the post who have a stupid amount of IP stockpiled so you can probably ask one of them. Good luck!
I added you, my nickname is Zetsu3000 ^.^
Ok, I've accepted the request. I'll gift you tomorrow as long as the OP doesn't contact me before hand.
Gift for Gift, i want that lovely icon. Same as the username above "SymbolicFear"
